Test Name: BASS BLACK (SEA BASS) (CENTROPRISTIS STRIATA) IgE Assay
Purpose: To quantify IgE specific to BASS BLACK (SEA BASS) allergens in patient serum for the diagnosis and monitoring of fish allergy.
Container: Serum collection tube (e.g., red-top or serum separator tube)
Equipment: ELISA plate reader, microplate washer, incubator, centrifuge, micropipettes, vortex mixer
